title: How to Dribble Like Cristiano Ronaldo

steps.headline: Increase your speed.
steps.description: To dribble like Cristiano Ronaldo, you need to be very fast. To improve on your speed, do some sprinting every day. More importantly, do stretches before a game or a run. You need stamina, so go for a jog around a field.

steps.headline: Run through speed ladders and cones, along with sprints to develop speed and agility.
Learn how to dribble.
steps.description: Before you get into flicks feints and step overs, train until you can dribble very fast between cones, keeping the ball under tight control and close to you all the time. Perfect the basics before you try to play like Ronaldo.

steps.headline: Learn how to do the step over/scissors move.
steps.description: This is done by swinging your foot around the ball and doing a body feint at the same time to send the defenders the wrong way.

steps.headline: Learn how to do the Ronaldo chop.
steps.description: This is done by jumping with one foot and in the same time using the inside of your other foot to go the other way. I prefer jumping with my left foot and using the inside of my right foot to go the other way.

steps.headline: Be able to cross the ball in the box.
steps.description: Use your speed and tricks to beat the full-back and whip the ball into the box!

steps.headline: Don't get too close to the defender.
steps.description: If you're too close, the defender can easily swipe the ball away from you. Try to get the ball between the legs of the defender.

steps.headline: Don't do a move too far away from a defender.
steps.description: If you're too far away, the defender will not get off-balanced and can still approach you.

steps.headline: Perform moves such as the "Ronaldo Chop" or "Step-Overs" at speed.
steps.description: Do them approximately 3 feet away from a defender.
